description:
The Mega Trail Mix Fleece Full Zip Hoodie is perfect for those who want a fleece's coziness and synthetic material performance. This hoodie is made with a soft and smooth bluesign®-approved 100% polyester fabric that is quick-drying, wicking, and breathable, making it ideal for aerobic activities in cool weather with built-in UPF 30 sun protection.

The three-panel hood provides coverage and warmth, while the zip hand pockets are perfect for storing small essentials. Expanding on our ever-popular Trail Mix Collection, the Mega Trail Mix Fleece Full Zip Hoodie is the perfect addition to your shoulder season wardrobe.
name: Outdoor Research Mega Trail Mix Fleece Full Zip Hoodie - Mens
